tool_description: Generates satellite ground track coordinates showing the path over Earth's surface for given orbital states.

timestamps.description: Array of UTC timestamps in ISO 8601 format

positions_km.description: Array of ECI position vectors corresponding to timestamps

error_messages: Array length mismatch: timestamps and positions_km arrays must have equal length.
Invalid position data: Each position must be a 3-element array with numeric values.
Timestamps not chronological: Input timestamps must be in ascending order.
usage: Provide synchronized arrays of timestamps and ECI positions. Tool accounts for Earth rotation to compute ground track coordinates.

latitudes_deg.description: Array of latitude coordinates in degrees (-90 to +90)

longitudes_deg.description: Array of longitude coordinates in degrees (-180 to +180)

altitudes_km.description: Array of altitudes above Earth surface in km
